Title: Grave Circumstances
Description:
The Court of Bones crawls with mogu forces. Endlessly do they perform their rituals of lightning and thunder.

If our mission to take this island is to succeed, then we cannot allow them to hold such a strategic position.

They must be eliminated.
ObjectivesText: Kill 10 Shan'ze Gravekeepers, Shan'ze Soulrippers, or Shan'ze Thundercallers.
RewardText: Excellent. You have dealt the mogu a blow that they shall not easily forget.

Objectives.Text: Shan'ze mogu slain at the Court of Bones
